id.description: Unique field ID. Can be used in CSS selectors to target the field, eg. to set its style, or during live refresh of the shown data from the backend.

name.description: Field name to be shown in the UI

data_path.description: JSON Path pointing to the input data structure (after input data transformation and JSON wrapping, if applied). It is used to pickup values to be shown in the UI.

id.description: ID of the `InputData` this instance is for.

fields.description: Fields of the component to be shown in the UI.

fields_all.description: All fields available for the component - generated only for `table` and `set-of-cards` components if enabled in agent's configuration. Can be used to provide user with the ability to manually select fields to be shown in the UI.

data_type_metadata.description: Optional type specific metadata from InputData, passed to the renderer. For example Tool call arguments used to load the data can be used by frontend to refresh data.

input_data_transformer_name.description: Name of the input data transformer used to transform the input data.

json_wrapping_field_name.description: Name of the field used for the input data `JSON Wrapping` if it was performed, `None` if `JSON Wrapping` was not performed.

component_metadata.description: Metadata of the generated UI component.

component_system.description: Component system used to render the UI block.

mime_type.description: MIME type of the UI block content.

content.description: Content of the UI block serialized into string.
